General.Name: XJ Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: XJ Electric Co., Ltd. provides energy and power technology and equipment in China. Its product portfolio includes intelligent transformation and distribution systems; DC transmission systems; intelligent medium voltage power supply and use equipment; smart meters; intelligent charging and swapping systems for electric vehicles; and EMS processing services. The company engages in the UHV, smart grid, new energy, electric vehicle charging and swapping, and rail transit and industrial intelligence businesses. It also provides technical, product, and support services for the production, transmission, distribution, and efficient utilization of clean energy. In addition, it is involved in the integrated energy, advanced energy storage, intelligent operation and maintenance, and Internet of things services. The company's intelligent power distribution system includes distribution network automation system, intelligent substation system, relay protection system, substation monitoring system, etc. XJ Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Xuchang, China.
